item.title: Hello world
item.description: It gives a different feeling than the one you get from starting a repository for an exciting new project but it is still pretty great â€” we are starting a new organisation to maintain and support foundational tools in the life sciences. Our primary experience lies in the field of computational genomics and lately single-cell sequencing technologies, and this has defined our scope and focus in the very beginning of our journey that we have called scverse.
